example.name: Adjectival rel: deserving; subject arg2
example.text: The account of the facts for whether it is a crime or not may be debatable , but the crime is absolutely not deserving of death , is it ... ?!
example.note: The subject is arg2 here because the crime is the thing in exchange for death, not the entity who is owed.
